title: Public Comments Sumbitted in Response to Request for Information on Federal Video and Image Analytics Research and Development Action Plan

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Public Comments Sumbitted in Response to Request for Information on Federal Video and Image Analytics Research and Development Action Plan
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

- The metadata of all of the public comments received in response to the National Science Foundation's Request for Information on Federal Video and Image Analytics Research and Development Action Plan (Document Number: 2022-15011).

- If possible, please include the public comments that have been submitted in response to this request for information.

I also request that, if appropriate, fees be waived as I am requesting for a the purpose of conducting a research project by the Information School at the University of Washington. Additionally, this request is being made for the purpose of scholarly and scientific research.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Nic Weber

title: Public Comments in Response to Request for Information on Advancing Privacy-Enhancing Technologies

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Public Comments in Response to Request for Information on Advancing Privacy-Enhancing Technologies
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

- The metadata of all of the public comments received in response to the Science and Technology Policy Office's Request for Information on Advancing Privacy-Enhancing Technologies(Document Number: OSTP-2022-0011-0001).

- If possible, please include the public comments that have been submitted in response to this request for information.

I also request that, if appropriate, fees be waived as I am requesting for a the purpose of conducting a research project by the Information School at the University of Washington. Additionally, this request is being made for the purpose of scholarly and scientific research.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Nic Weber
